name: Tamala Project Demo
description:
Tamala Demo is a demo project for my main game Tamala and the Rusted Crown. It is a platformer action adventure fantasy game. The demo only has one controllable character for now, Imress Nesur. The main game will have multiple main characters with their own story.

Imress Nesur is the Sword Princess of the Kingdon of Nesur. The demo is set in a rural village called Agan which is mostly used as training grounds by the Kingdoms forces.

This demo is is easily played to completion within 5mins, but will be updated in the future for other feature testing. Have Fun

Donations are optional but it will help me. Thank you for your support.
